channel.title: [PI] Npc maxing 1 damage (after editing spawn-config entry)
channel.description:
I was adding an npc that had yet to have any presence in my class/config files and upon several tests it continues to have a max hit of one.
Entries below: [code]spawn = 5902 2334 9819 0 1 40 1000 200 The Inadequacy npc = 5902 The_Inadequacy 450 320 [/code]
While the npc does have the set hp (320), it still continues to hit one damage. I've assumed this has something to do with it not previously being added in, but I don't know what else I can edit. I've gone ahead and already set all the attacks/anims/delays in NPCHandler and to no avail.
Any ideas as to what else I can try?

item.title: [PI] Npc maxing 1 damage (after editing spawn-config entry)
item.dc:creator: @darthbonsly darthbonsly
item.description:
@darthbonsly wrote:

[code]// spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description

//God Ruins
spawn = 5902 2334 9819 0 1 40 1000 200 The Inadequacy
/Chaos elemetal/
spawn = 3200 3266 3925 0 1 32 500 200 Chaos elemental[/code]

The chaos elemental has hit at least 28 damage on me before.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Npc maxing 1 damage (after editing spawn-config entry)

item.title: [PI] Npc maxing 1 damage (after editing spawn-config entry)

@system wrote:

Max hit of one, And I see a 1 in the code you’ve provided?
